LanguageData.CookASUWhiteBread.label: Bake Shokupan
LanguageData.CookASUWhiteBread.description: Bake some plain ol' white bread.
LanguageData.CookASUWhiteBread10.label: Bake Shokupan x10
LanguageData.CookASUWhiteBread10.description: Bake some plain ol' white bread.
LanguageData.CookASUButterWhiteBread.label: Make Batātōsuto x2
LanguageData.CookASUButterWhiteBread.description: Toast some bread and spread on a "bit" of butter.
LanguageData.CookASUJamWhiteBread.label: Make Jamutōsuto x3
LanguageData.CookASUJamWhiteBread.description: Toast some bread and find a jam to lather on it.
LanguageData.CookASUOguraWhiteBread.label: Make Oguratōsuto x3
LanguageData.CookASUOguraWhiteBread.description: Toast some bread and top it with Ogura mochi and butter.
LanguageData.CookASUJBaconWhiteBread.label: Make Bēkontōsuto x3
LanguageData.CookASUJBaconWhiteBread.description: Toast some bread and throw some bacon on it.
LanguageData.CookASUFriedEggWhiteBread.label: Make Medamayakitōsuto x3
LanguageData.CookASUFriedEggWhiteBread.description: Toast some bread and then-very carefully-place a fried egg on it.
LanguageData.CookASUSandwich.label: Make Sandoitchi x3
LanguageData.CookASUSandwich.description: Take some bread and add vegetables to make a sandwich out of it.
